attributes.action: encourge all MPs to donate any expenses which were paid under the rules of the ACA section of the Green book incorrectly to the Save Bletchley Park Fund.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be nice to demonstrate to the general public in this matter,that rather than just saying sorry. MP's at the palace of Westminster can show that from all the controversy they could simply donate all the offending expense claims and make a real impact on saving the World Heritage Site of modern Computing.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
